Please be aware                                                                                                                                         that weekends are not business days. All express methods of shipment still may require 1 day of processing time. We cannot ship as a gift, or claim as lower value. New Jersey buyers are responsible for applicable sales tax. We ship everything professionally in our state of the art warehouse. All products we sell are brand new and includes warranty coverage unless clearly                                                                                                                                         specified on the listing. "Free Shipping" applies to orders shipped within the continental                                                                                                                                         US. Domestic orders ship FedEx, UPS, and USPS. Our packages are insured and may require a signature. In accordance with PayPal                                                                                                                                         and eBay policies, we cannot reroute your package to a different address or hold                                                                                                                                         your shipment at the local hub for pick up, your order must be delivered to the                                                                                                                                         confirmed PayPal address received with your purchase. We cannot change your address                                                                                                                                         before the order ships. Please do not submit handling instructions in the notes                                                                                                                                         of your order requesting special handling, a specific courier or a change of address,                                                                                                                                         as we will be unable to meet these requests. We do not offer price protection if the price of an item                                                                                                                                         that you purchased. Prices do change frequently. We reserve the right to cancel orders placed without a registered eBay or                                                                                                                                         PayPal account. Orders placed by eBay guest checkout require additional verification                                                                                                                                         and may be delayed. Orders placed without a registered PayPal account cannot be                                                                                                                                         accepted and will be cancelled and refunded upon receipt. We offer a customer 30 day return privilege policy. A Return Merchandise Authorization                                                                                                                                             (RMA) number must be obtained for any return. To obtain an RMA number, please call                                                                                                                                             us toll free at 866-673-7187 . Returned packages without proper RMA demarcations will be refused by our warehouse                                                                                                                                             and returned to you. Customers who refuse a delivery, will be subject to charges                                                                                                                                             for return shipping to us. If the item was advertised as Free Shipping, then we                                                                                                                                             will charge the amount of shipping as determined by the FedEx shipping calculator. Some returns are subject to a restocking fee. The restocking percentage will depend                                                                                                                                             on the condition of the returned product. Defective products are eligible for exchange,                                                                                                                                             and no restock fee will apply. All returns must be packed with all contents which came with the original package                                                                                                                                             including, cables, software, plastic and cardboard packaging, and unregistered warranty                                                                                                                                             card. This return policy excludes Televisions and Home Theater Projectors. For further                                                                                                                                             questions please call us toll free at 866-673-7187 .
